actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for addition to the Fort Clatsop National Memorial of the site of salt cairn utilized by the Lewis and Clark Expedition, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the addition to the Fort Clatsop National Memorial of the site of the salt cairn utilized by the Lewis and Clark Expedition which encamped at Fort Clatsop, Oregon. Limits the size of the designated site to 130 acres.

titles.title: A bill to provide for addition to the Fort Clatsop National Memorial of the site of salt cairn utilized by the Lewis and Clark Expedition, and for other purposes.
